item.title: Go pprof Ref
item.description: GCTRACE gctrace: setting gctrace=1 causes the garbage collector to emit a single line to standard error at each collection, summarizing the amount of memory collected and the length of the pause. The format of this line is subject to change. Currently, it is: gc # @#s #%: #+#+# ms clock, #+#/#/#+# ms cpu, #->#-># MB, # MB goal, # P where the fields are as follows: gc # the GC number, incremented at each GC @#s time in seconds since program start #% percentage of time spent in GC since program start #+.

item.title: Delve Hand Book
item.description: Launch a session dlv debug works like go run, it will build an run a GO package dlv exec will start a seesion with a precompiled binary, in order to properly debug a binary, it shoud be compiled with optimizations disablesd, eg. with -gcflags="all=-N -l" dlv attach will attach to a PID of a runnig Go binary Delve commands in a debugging session print, p whatis will print the datatype of an expression
